alert.note: Alert for Northern Elko County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; South Central Elko County; Southwest Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 22 at 5:11PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Elko County through 545 PM PDT... At 510 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Deeth, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wells, Deeth, Angel Lake, and Star Valley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Elko County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; South Central Elko County; Southwest Elko County
